description: Numbers n such that sum of digits of n equals the numbers of divisors of n.
comments: [A007953(n)/A000005(n) = c] AND [A000005(n)/A007953(n) = c], c an integer. [_Ctibor O. Zizka_, Jun 26 2009]
links: Daniel Arribas, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..210
example: 36 is a member as the sum of the digits of 36 is 3+6 = 9 and the number of divisors is 9 too.
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Sep 03 2000
